definition: melon seed/seeds of pumpkin, watermelon or sunflower etc, roasted and flavored, consumed as a snack

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
Tellina iridescens (a bivalve mollusk)/any similar small clam

sentences.english: For schistosomiasis: xiong huang with nan gua zi (pumpkin seeds), bin nang.
sentences.chinese: 血吸蟲病，可與南瓜子，檳榔等同用。

sentences.english: Both pine nuts and pumpkin seeds are sexual adjuvants .
sentences.chinese: 松子和南瓜子都是性增效劑。

sentences.english: I'm sorry, did you just call me a stupid-head ?
sentences.chinese: 等一下，你剛叫我笨腦袋瓜子？

sentences.english: This paper introduced emulsifying stabilization in the processing technology of pumpkin seed powder.
sentences.chinese: 對南瓜子粉加工工藝中的乳化穩定性進行了研究。

sentences.english: Sweep the melon-seed shells into a dustpan .
sentences.chinese: 把瓜子殼胡嚕到簸箕裏。

sentences.english: Many women dream of a sleek and refined face contour.
sentences.chinese: 擁有一張纖細清秀的瓜子臉是衆多女士的夢想。

sentences.english: She is a typical frame, a small nose and mouth wide.
sentences.chinese: 她是一個典型的瓜子臉，小鼻子，嘴巴有點寬。

sentences.english: Watermelon seeds don't come from just any watermelon.
sentences.chinese: 並非任何西瓜子都能製成瓜子。

sentences.english: Watermelon seeds don't come from just any watermelon.
sentences.chinese: 並非任何西瓜子都能製成瓜子。

sentences.english: In the days of material scarcity, we could only afford to buy 100 grams of peanuts, some sunflower seeds and some fruit candies.
sentences.chinese: 物質匱乏的時候只能買二兩花生，瓜子和水果糖。

sentences.english: She has got an oval face, with wavy hair and a pair of big eyes.
sentences.chinese: 她有一張瓜子臉，波浪形的頭髮，一對大眼睛。

sentences.english: In the days of material scarcity, we could only afford to buy 100 grams of peanuts, some sunflower seeds and some fruit candies. Nowadays, we enjoy all kinds of goods.
sentences.chinese: 物質匱乏的時候只能買二兩花生，瓜子和水果糖。

sentences.english: Objective To study the killing mechanism of decoction of areca and pumpkin seeds on Taenia solium .
sentences.chinese: 目的研究檳榔南瓜子合劑對豬帶絛蟲的殺蟲機理。

sentences.english: All of a sudden, it occurred to me that my money was missing.
sentences.chinese: 忽然，我只感到腦瓜子嗡地一下響，糟了，錢沒了。

sentences.english: Big watermelon seeds with a distinctive taste must come in for your profuse praise.
sentences.chinese: 闊板西瓜子，口味獨特，令您讚不絕口。

sentences.english: She has an oval face and is very tall, which makes her a beautiful girl.
sentences.chinese: 瓜子兒臉，高個頭，是個挺漂亮的姑娘。

definition: immature green soy beans, either still in the pod (edamame) or removed from the pod
